D

Display - Class in com.fergusleah.dla
Display is responsible for displaying the DLA using the OpenGL graphics library.
Display(DLALogic) - Constructor for class com.fergusleah.dla.Display
Initialises the DLALogic variable which provides the DLA that will be displayed.
display(GLAutoDrawable) - Method in class com.fergusleah.dla.Display
Display the DLA structure.
displayChanged(GLAutoDrawable, boolean, boolean) - Method in class com.fergusleah.dla.Display
Provided to satisfy interface but not required.
DLAFrame - Class in com.fergusleah.dla
DLAFrame is responsible for setting up the display frame and the user interface.
DLAFrame() - Constructor for class com.fergusleah.dla.DLAFrame
Setup the frame, graphics library display, user interface and DLA logic thread.
DLALogic - Class in com.fergusleah.dla
DLALogic is responsible for running the diffusion limited aggregation algorithm which causes the structure to grow.
DLALogic() - Constructor for class com.fergusleah.dla.DLALogic
